summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hogwarts Music Studio MVP. Backend APIs mostly functional (93.9% success rate), frontend has beautiful glassmorphic design but some UI interaction issues need fixing.

fixed_issues.fix_applied: Modified booking creation to exclude _id field from response

minor_issues.issue: Rate limiting on Resend API (2 requests/second)
minor_issues.impact: May delay email confirmations during high traffic

ui_bugs.issue: Chat widget button blocked by Emergent badge overlay
Calendar date selection and time slots not working properly

design_issues.positive: Beautiful glassmorphic design with proper gradients and effects

passed_tests: Homepage loads with glassmorphic navbar and hero section
Navigation works between all pages (Home, Services, Projects, About)
Services page displays all 6 services with correct pricing (â‚¹299/hr for Dubbing)
User registration and login flow functional

critical_fixes: Fix chat widget overlay issue - chat button is blocked by Emergent badge
Fix booking form calendar and time slot selection functionality
Resolve service dropdown validation in booking form
recommendations: Consider implementing proper z-index management for overlays
Test booking form end-to-end flow thoroughly
Add error handling for calendar component edge cases
